price: 49. And of everything We have created pairs, that you may remember (the Grace of Allâh).
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
